name: Eric Prydz
description:
'''Eric Sheridan Prydz''' ({{IPAc-en|p|r|ɪ|d|z}}, {{IPA|sv|ˈêːrɪk ˈɕêːrɪdan ˈprʏts|lang}}; born 19 July 1976), also known by his many aliases including '''Pryda''' ({{IPAc-en|ˈ|p|r|aɪ|d|ə}}) and '''Cirez D''' ({{IPAc-en|ˈ|s|aɪ|r|ɛ|z}}), is a Swedish DJ and record producer. He rose to prominence with his 2004 hit single "[[Call on Me (Eric Prydz song)|Call on Me]]", and saw continued chart success with "[[Proper Education]]" in 2007, "[[Pjanoo]]" in 2008, and "[[Opus (instrumental)|Opus]]" in 2015. In 2016, he released his debut studio album, ''[[Opus (Eric Prydz album)|Opus]]''.

In 2017, he won DJ of the Year at the [[Electronic Music Awards]] and was also nominated for Live Act of the Year.
